title: Print, "Love Meditating on Its Consort (Sofuren), No. 7", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: Love Meditating on its Consort
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 7 / Sofuren.
description: A large iris, the outer perianth leaves in mottled light purple on neutral background. Inner leaves white, with purple tips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Love Meditating on Its Consort (Sofuren), No. 7", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 41.1 x 27.9 cm (16 3/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-62.
